subanswer.text: John spent 6 hours boating; therefore, he spent 6 / 2 = 3 hours swimming. The answer is 3.

subanswer.text: Watching 3 movies lasted for 2*3=6 hours together. These represented 30% of his holiday period, meaning they took up 0.3 * 24 = <<0.3*24=7.2>>7.2 hours or roughly equivalent to one full day minus some fractional part since typical daily periods wouldn’t include partial hours when considering whole numbers.
